title: Bloomberg Markets: Dietze on Impact of Possible Tax Reform
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dietze on Impact of Possible Tax Reform
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David G Dietze\u0010President/Founder\u0010Point View Wealth Management \u0010Discussing President Trump's tax plan, which he says would be positive for the markets.  However, it would not benefit all equally, because part of the legislation may involve loss of deductions.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
